hero_title:
# Standalone accounts for *Decap CMS*

You use [Decap CMS](https://decapcms.org/) with Github, but don't want to ask your users to create a Github account to login? And you don't want to use Netlify? And you also don't want to setup your own authentication and user management service? This is just what you need.

meta.title: Home page
meta.description: Welcome page for your new website.
